attributes.action: Keep Chris Moyles on Radio 1 breakfast show
attributes.additional_details: Why should Radio 1 give up its best ever breakfast DJ because the station seems 'to old' people listen because its good, doesn't matter if you are old  or young. The audience is who it is. Listen to the listeners not rubbish commercial radio managers who arent getting figures because their stations arent good enough.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
